content: अलंबुषः {@--1@} Vomiting. {@--2@} The palm of the hand with the fingers extended. {@--3@} Prahasta, the minister of Rāvaṇa. {@--4@} A demon killed by Ghaṭotkacha. --षा {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of a nymph or of a class of nymphs. {@--2@} A kind of plant (लज्जालु). {@--3@} A barrier, a line of water drawn to prevent entrance ( अन्याप्रवेशार्थं दत्ता जलरेखा).
